**Government Tender Announcement**
**Procurement Notice**

**Stream 1, Internal Audit Services: Professional Audit Support Services (PASS)**
**Reference Number:** cb-7099-9297420
**Publication Date:** July 11, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 9, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is inviting Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to submit proposals to provide Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) under Stream 1, Internal Audit Services. This requirement is limited to SA Holders who have qualified under the specified categories.

**Notice Details:**
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Tender Description:**
The RCMP requires a contractor to conduct an independent internal assessment of the Central Region Radio Renewal (CR3) project. The assessment will evaluate the project's internal controls, risk management, and overall effectiveness. The successful contractor will require a Security Clearance of RCMP Enhanced Reliability Status (ERS).

**Eligible Bidders:**
The following SA Holders have been invited to submit proposals: 23 firms, including industry leaders such as Deloitte, EY, KPMG, and PwC, among others.

**Proposal Submission:**
Qualified SA Holders can submit their proposals electronically to the Contracting Authority, Diane Perkins, at diane.perkins@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. The proposal submission deadline is August 9, 2023.

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries, please contact Diane Perkins at (613) 327-7437 or diane.perkins@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Website Reference:**
The RCMP has published its National Procurement Plan at https://www.rcmp-grc.gc.ca/en/rcmp-national-procurement-plan.
